game.title: The quest for the golden apple
game.description: The golden apple is a magical artifact that can be used to cure all illnesses. It is rumored to be hidden somewhere in the kingdom.

task.objective: Locate the hidden chest in the royal garden
task.description: Catalogue the items inside and bring it to the king's castle.

task.objective: Search the ancient library for a clue
task.description: Uncover a map leading to the apple's location by deciphering an old tome.
